articles.title: Markram reveals Proteas' straightforward strategy in Nepal nail-biter - ICC Cricket
articles.description: Skipper Aiden Markram said that a 'simple middle-overs' plan helped South Africa to victory.
articles.content:
Earlier, it was Shamsis 4/19 that swung the game Proteas way. His double strike in the 18th over, getting Dipendra Singh Airee (6) and Aasif Sheikh (42) derailed a set chase.
While Shamsi along with… [+980 chars]

articles.title: 'Jadeja, Kohli, Rohit are good, but...': India coach gives sizzling take on team’s ‘best fielder’ in T20 World Cup - Hindustan Times
articles.description: India coach T Dilip picked his side's ‘best fielder’and it wasn't Ravindra Jadeja, Rohit Sharma or Virat Kohli. | Crickit
articles.content: Having already qualified for the Super 8s, India face Canada in their final T20 World Cup group stage fixture, in Lauderhill on Saturday. Team India's bowling attack has performed admirably, winning … [+2031 chars]
